channel.title: CVE Feed for Metaswitch -- cassandra-rs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Metaswitch -- cassandra-rs

item.title: CVE-2024-27284|2024-02-28T15:46:37.388Z -- metaswitch -- cassandra-rs
item.description: cassandra-rs is a Cassandra (CQL) driver for Rust. Code that attempts to use an item (e.g., a row) returned by an iterator after the iterator has advanced to the next item will be accessing freed memory and experience undefined behaviour. The problem has been fixed in version 3.0.0.
